thread.title: News Corp. to buy social video ad firm for $176 million
thread.title_full: News Corp. to buy social video ad firm for $176 million | Breaking News & Headlines

author: Graham Finley
title: News Corp. to buy social video ad firm for $176 million
text:
News Corp. announced plans Wednesday to purchase London-based social video ad firm Unruly for up to $176 million.
Unruly will operate as an independent unit, reporting to Rebekah Brooks, chief executive of News UK.
Unruly’s proprietary technology aims to predict the likelihood that videos will go viral. Its customers include Adidas, Renault and T-Mobile.
“Unruly is a feisty and creative corporation with a start off-up sensibility that fits completely with our own method to developing enterprises in the digital age,” said CEO Robert Thomson of News Corp., which also publishes The Post.
